text: (eyata deviyan “obata) mehi (mema danduvama læbimata) hetuva nam, “allah ek keneki’yayi kiyanu læbu vita, (eya) oba pratiksepa kalehuya. ohuta (yam kisiveku) samanayak kala vita, (eya) oba visvasa kalehuya! ebævin (ada dina obata læbi æti) mema tinduva itamat visalavanta ha usasvantaya vana allahtama ayatya” (yayi pavasanu æta)
